name: Biswanath Mukherjee
content: Mukherjee, Biswanath – Computer Science Home Distinguished Professor Biswanath Mukherjee Department of Computer Science 3037 Kemper Hall University of California Davis, CA 95616 Professor Mukherjee’s personal web page Email: mukherje at cs.ucdavis.edu Phone: (530) 752-4826 Research Lightwave networks; telecom networks, including solutions for broadband access networks exploiting optical and wireless technologies; energy-efficient network architectures (for sustainability); Future Internet Design, including hybrid circuit-packet networks, dynamic circuit switching, Ethernet Everywhere; survivable network architectures (to combat large-scale failures and attacks). Comments are closed. Distinguished Professor Biswanath Mukherjee Computer Science University of California Davis, CA 95616 Email: mukherje at cs.ucdavis.edu Phone: (530) 752-4826
